name: node-rand
description: Node JS Addon wrapping c++ rng for seed-random reproducibility

scripts.test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.build: cd ./src && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build -j 4 --release && cd ../ && tsc && grunt
scripts.build:dev: cd ./src && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build -j 4 --debug && cd ../ && tsc && grunt copy-debug

author: Chris Boese
